author: butteryink_2007
comment: Not sure if this helps, but I am applying for the NTUC Starter Awards because apparently the GPA requirement on their website is just 3.0. It seems this scholarship focuses more on CCAs and leadership experience. This is the link that I applied with: https://www.lit.sg/ntuc-starter-awards
